nodes.text: Eradication Day was the name used by the Eagle's network members during the Cold War for the final step of their plan that consisted in activating the Eradicator weapons to destroy the Sith Empire. However, they were unaware that this plan was masterminded by Dark Councilor Darth Jadus in order to eliminate his rivals and take control of the Empire. The plot was eventually foiled by Imperial Agent Cipher Nine.
The Eradication Day only occurs if the player picks the Dark Side option. In the Light Side option the Eradicators are never fired.
